title: Global barley producers by country 2018/19
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in million metric tons for 17 number of Countrys.
Country European Union has the highest Amount in million metric tons and Belarus has the lowest Amount in million metric tons.
The difference of Amount in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 54.64.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in million metric tons for 17 number of Countrys.
The Amount in million metric tons is highest at Country European Union and lowest at Country Belarus.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Amount in million metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Amount in million metric tons 56.34 is found at Country European Union and the minimum is found at Belarus where Country is 1.7.
Country Russia has the second highest value for Amount in million metric tons.
The difference of Amount in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 54.64.
Amount in million metric tons at Country European Union is 56.34 , second place is Russia at 16.6, and thirdly is Others at 9.68.
Country Ukraine, and Turkey have a similar Amount in million metric tons that is 7.4.
